title: Here's what smart people in economics and business are saying about the DOJ's Fed probe
full_text:
Here's what smart people in economics and business are saying about the DOJ's Fed probe. Powell described the move as a part of a broader effort to pressure the central bank on monetary policy.. Fed chair Jerome PowellAlex Wong/Getty Images
  • Fed Chair Jerome Powell said the central bank has received grand jury subpoenas from the Justice Department.
  • Economists, business leader… [+2215 chars]
